name: Covalence
description:
Important: due to an engine bug, this game can't be played in Chromium-based browsers (Chrome, Opera, Vivaldi, etc.) We recommend using Mozilla Firefox.

This game is our entry for My First Game Jam: Summer 2018 and also our first time creating a game together! We're really proud of what we came together to create and hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed creating it. There's definitely still some things that we want to polish up here and there, but at this point the game is complete (with regards to plot) and fully playable.
